articles.description: All the latest Premier League reaction as Arsenal are held to a 2-2 draw with Crystal Palace leaving Liverpool one points away from the title.
articles.title: Premier League reaction: Liverpool one point from title as Arsenal held by Palace

articles.description: Relegated Leicester City announce captain Jamie Vardy will leave the club at the end of the season.
articles.title: Jamie Vardy: Leicester City captain to leave club at  end of the season

articles.description: As Virgil van Dijk prepares to lift his second Premier League title with Liverpool, we look at how the 33-year-old centre-back learned from early setbacks to become one of the best in the world.
articles.title: Virgil van Dijk: How Liverpool captain became world's best

articles.description: Newcastle United manager Eddie Howe is back at work after a stay in hospital with pneumonia.
articles.title: Eddie Howe: Newcastle manager returns to work after hospital stay

articles.description: Cricketer-turned-TV host Andrew "Freddie" Flintoff opens up about his car crash for the first time.
articles.title: Andrew Flintoff 'thought he had died' in Top Gear crash

articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz withdraws from the Madrid Open because of injury - but is hopeful of being fit for his French Open title defence.
articles.title: Carlos Alcaraz withdraws from Madrid Open with groin injury

articles.description: BBC Sport takes a look at how things stand across the German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Dutch and French leagues.
articles.title: Bundesliga, La Liga, Seria A, Ligue 1: How do Europe's title races stand?

articles.description: Aston Villa announce plans to increase Villa Park's capacity to over 50,000 by redeveloping the North Stand.
articles.title: Aston Villa announce plans to increase Villa Park capacity to over 50,000

articles.description: Northampton tyro Henry Pollock is named on an eight-strong shortlist for the best player in this season's Champions Cup.
articles.title: Henry Pollock: Champions Cup Player of the Year award nomination for Northampton youngster

articles.description: Great Britain's Olympic and world triathlon champion Alex Yee speaks to BBC Sport before taking on his first London Marathon on Sunday.
articles.title: Alex Yee: Olympic triathlon champion set for London Marathon debut
